subject: [Filter] Analyze existing prompted traces for implicit vs explicit sandbagging
description:
Filter existing prompted sandbagger traces to identify:
- Explicit: Mentions strategy, bias, systematic approach
- Implicit: No strategy leakage but still sandbagging

Use combination of:
1. Keyword matching (current)
2. LLM judge for SAS/suspicious scoring (Claude 3.5 Haiku or similar)
3. Count how many implicit traces remain after strict filtering

Deliverable: Filtered dataset splits, statistics on explicit vs implicit volumes
activeForm: Filtering prompted traces for strategy leakage
